text: 《少年歌行》是由优酷、晨星盛世、中影年年联合出品，尹涛执导，李宏毅领衔主演，刘学义特别主演，林博洋、敖瑞鹏、李欣泽、戴燕妮等主演的古装偶像剧[1][4]
prompt:
best quality,masterpiece,illustration, an extremely delicate and beautiful,extremely detailed,CG,unity,8k wallpaper, The画面 shows a beautiful Chinese古装 drama scene, with the characters of Li Hongyi, Liu Xianyi, Li Xinzi, and Da Yan妮 walking through a bustling city street. The camera pans down to show the bustling streets and towering buildings, with people passing by on their way to work or school.

In the foreground, a group of people are gathered around a performance of a traditional Chinese musical piece. The lead actor, Li Hongyi, is singing and playing the instruments, while the other actors are performing their parts as well. The scene is filled with energy and passion, and the audience is able to feel the emotions and passion of the characters as they are performing.

The camera then zooms in on Li Hongyi, who is performing with his fellow actors, as they take a break to rest. The scene is surrounded by a beautiful setting, with the city in the background and the stars shining brightly in the sky.

Overall, the scene shows the beauty and richness of Chinese culture, and the passion and energy of the actors in their performance.
